page.title: 14AINTREE RACECOURSE TODAY
page.content:
{Aintree Racecourse}is owned by a group called the Racecourse Holding Trust, and is run by the Aintree Racecourse Company Ltd. The course is used by the {Aintree Motor Cycle}and{Aintree Motor {Cross}Club. It is also used by{Pony {Clubs} and for shows. The fences are permanent frameworks with spruce added for the races. Chemicals are used to clear weeds. Last{Grand National}there were 42,920 people present, of which 500 people were seated in the stands. There are 4 office staff on a permanent basis. These are increased by 3 office and 5 ground staff in the season. The racecourse complex covers 300 acres.
Joan Murphy.
